content: https://i.imgur.com/SSo3ij2.png B-MONEY : Blockchain Collectibles_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________https://i.imgur.com/kw0dNZL.png  https://i.imgur.com/3tjawcx.png  https://i.imgur.com/VLuTL9G.png   https://i.imgur.com/8YVVSCd.png   https://i.imgur.com/epkPFTa.png   https://i.imgur.com/7Qld6sd.png   https://i.imgur.com/3tjawcx.png     https://i.imgur.com/3tjawcx.pngWEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER  | MEDIUM  | YOUTUBE  | TELEGRAM  | CONTRACT  | AUDIT  |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________About B-money DAO:Ever since the coming of bitcoin in the year 2008, there has been a launch of thousands of new cryptocurrencies. The entire market capitalization got to 2.5 trillion dollars in the month of May 2021 . The demand for blockchain technology actually reveals our need for honesty and safety. The field obviously gives investment opportunities serving as an alternative financial ecosystem. However, projects are emerging at an increasing rate to bring this technology to real life. A very promising start for a technology that is still in its infancy. Behind the power of today's cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, there are many scientific and social steps taken by great people. B-money DAO aims to inform and create a social memory by bringing up key people and events in the history of blockchain. Turning the important milestones into Memento Cryptocurrencies as a tribute to those that serve the cryptocurrency community. Memento CC is the first digital adaptation of the Mint’s Commemorative Coin. The first cryptocurrency of the B-money DAO is B-MONEY. The DAO and pioneer Memento CC take their names from Wei Dai's 1998 b-money project which inspired Satoshi Nakamoto while creating Bitcoin and the blockchain in use today. The DAO honors and rewards people -known to have played an important role in historical events- for their contributions. Every Memento CC is based on a historical fact and allocates a stake to the person behind the event or to their relatives. Wei Dai's ‘B-money’ is cited as the first reference in Bitcoin’s whitepaper. One of the most important milestones in blockchain history. Defined as an Anonymous Distributed Electronic Cash System ten years earlier than bitcoin. We started with the B-Money project to remember the project most likely to inspire Satoshi Nakamoto building the blockchain behind Bitcoin. B-money is a reliable and powerful exchange tool for the next Memento CCs and corresponding NFTs with serial numbers.★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY DETAILS★★★★★1. Bounty Campaign is managed by PanduGeddonrozak2. $30,000 worth of BUSD will be divided to all participants depending on stakes accumulated3. Bounty Campaign will run for 2 weeks -  17/05/2022 - 31/05/20224. Bounty rewards will be distributed 3 day after the bounty ends.5. Bounty rewards will be sent to your BEP-20 Wallet address6. Wallet address cannot be change once submitted7. Participants must join the bounty group8. I'am just a campaign manager and distribution is done by the project team.★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY RULES★★★★★1. Bounty Campaign is managed by PanduGeddonrozak2. Must follow telegram channel - https://t.me/PanduGeddonrozak_ch3. Must join telegram bounty - https://t.me/+p2Ne3GqqBM9iNjM14. KYC is not required to join and receive rewards from B-Money bounty campaign5. User with negative trust from DT members will be accepted★★★★★BOUNTY ALLOCATION★★★★★Twitter: 60%Telegram: 40%★★★★★BOUNTY SCHEDULE★★★★★Week 1: 17/05/2022 - 23/05/2022Week 2: 24/05/2022 - 30/05/2022Distribution : 03/06/2022Proof Of Registration FormatQuote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BEP20  Wallet Address:★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Must follow B_MONEY_DAO twitter profile: https://twitter.com/B_MONEY_DAO2. Twitter Account must have atleast 300 followers3. Participants must RT + Quote (Max of 1 per day) 5 tweets made by B_MONEY_DAO4. Participants must tweet 2 original tweet (Max of 1 per day)5. HASTAG : #memento #collection #b-money #NFT #cryptocurrency★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★300 to 1999 Followers = 1 Stake2000 to 5000 Followers = 2 Stakes5001 and Up Followers = 3 StakesForm: https://forms.gle/oezE9fcxxMAaqkP18★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Must follow B_MONEY_DAO Telegram group: B_MONEY_DAO2. Must create an informative post about B_MONEY_DAO3. Must include Telegram group link on your post.4. Max of 5 post per week5. HASTAG : #memento #collection #b-money #NFT #cryptocurrency★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★10 Stake per valid postForm: https://forms.gle/htbQSg1j2Jgn5xZu9★★★★★CAMPAIGN REPORTING GUIDE★★★★★Bitcointalk UsernameBitcointalk Profile LinkProof of Authentication Link:Week # Twitter CampaignRT + Quote #1: RT + Quote #2: RT + Quote #3: RT + Quote #4: RT + Quote #5: Own Tweet #1Own Tweet #2Telegram CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3Post Link #5Post Link #5SPREADSHEETS update soon
